text: I tried killing myself   weeks ago and I want to do it again Sure  I have plenty of people to turn to  But where has that gotten me so far  My mom just up and left  I m not upset about that  she can stay gone for all I care  but my little sister is just a mess and my dad now wants a divorce   It doesn t matter anymore  She s at Virginia Beach  probably staring off into the seas  She s never cared how her actions affected anyone else  She just uses her Bipolar as an excuse to be an entitled  whiny brat of a person  I can t stand it  I can t stand them  The only reason I haven t downed a bottle of pills  relapsed in cutting  or a million other things  is my sister I just want to collapse into myself and stop existing  But I just want to go  I don t even matter to my own parents  I m just the fucked up  overdramatic  suicidal teenaged kid  I need to rot in the ground
summary: Suicide is not an option for a suicidal teenaged boy. His mother left him and his father wants a divorce. The only reason he hasn't killed himself is because of his bipolar sister. He doesn't even matter to his parents.
cleaned: suicide not option suicidal teenage boy mother leave father want divorce reason not kill bipolar sister not matter parent
